column4: TEC-001 GL-PPM Combined API GL-Only Simple Journal
column5: Validate GL-only 2-line journal loads as a journal in Oracle.

column4: TEC-002 GL-PPM Combined API PPM-Only Simple Journal
column5: Validate PPM-only 2-line journal loads as pair of PPM costs in Oracle.

column4: TEC-003 GL-PPM Combined API GL-PPM Simple Journal
column5: Validate GL and PPM 2-line journal loads into both modules.

column4: TEC-004 GL-PPM Combined API PPM-Only Two BU Journal
column5: Validate that a PPM journal which references projects in both business units loads into Oracle.

column4: TEC-005 GL-PPM Combined API Journal Rejected by Oracle
column5: Validate that a journal that rejects during Oracle job processing provides appropriate feedback.

column4: TEC-006 GL-PPM Combined SFTP Journal Processed
column5: Validate GL-only 2-line journal submitted via SFTP loads as a journal in Oracle.

column4: TEC-007 GL-PPM Combined SFTP Journal Rejected
column5: Validate that a SFTP journal rejected during pipeline processing sends feedback.
Validate that invoice and gl journal are created.
